020package org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.internal;
021
022import static java.util.Arrays.stream;
023import static java.util.stream.Collectors.toList;
024import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.DEPRECATED;
025import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.INTERNAL;
026import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.STABLE;
027import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.checkState;
028import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.nonNull;
029import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.requireNonNullArgument;
030import static org.tquadrat.foundation.util.StringUtils.format;
031
032import java.io.UncheckedIOException;
033import java.lang.reflect.Modifier;
034import java.lang.reflect.ParameterizedType;
035import java.lang.reflect.Type;
036import java.util.ArrayList;
037import java.util.List;
038import java.util.Map;
039import java.util.Optional;
040
041import org.apiguardian.api.API;
042import org.tquadrat.foundation.annotation.ClassVersion;
043import org.tquadrat.foundation.exception.ValidationException;
044import org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.AnnotationSpec;
045import org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.ClassName;
046import org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.ParameterizedTypeName;
047import org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.TypeName;
048import org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.TypeVariableName;
049
050/**
051 *  The implementation of
052 *  {@link TypeNameImpl}
053 *  for parameterised types.
054 *
055 *  @modified Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
056 *  @version $Id: ParameterizedTypeNameImpl.java 943 2021-12-21 01:34:32Z tquadrat $
057 *  @since 0.0.5
058 *
059 *  @UMLGraph.link
060 */
061@ClassVersion( sourceVersion = "$Id: ParameterizedTypeNameImpl.java 943 2021-12-21 01:34:32Z tquadrat $" )
062@API( status = INTERNAL, since = "0.0.5" )
063public final class ParameterizedTypeNameImpl extends TypeNameImpl implements ParameterizedTypeName
064{
065        /*------------*\
066    ====** Attributes **=======================================================
067        \*------------*/
068    /**
069     *  The enclosing type, if any.
070     */
071    @SuppressWarnings( "OptionalUsedAsFieldOrParameterType" )
072    private final Optional<ParameterizedTypeNameImpl> m_EnclosingType;
073
074    /**
075     *  The class name for this type.
076     */
077    @SuppressWarnings( "InstanceVariableOfConcreteClass" )
078    private final ClassNameImpl m_RawType;
079
080    /**
081     *  The type arguments.
082     */
083    private final List<TypeNameImpl> m_TypeArguments;
084
085        /*--------------*\
086    ====** Constructors **=====================================================
087        \*--------------*/
088    /**
089     *  Creates a new {@code ParameterizedTypeNameImpl} instance.
090     *
091     *  @param  enclosingType   The optional enclosing type for this instance.
092     *  @param  rawType The class name for this instance.
093     *  @param  typeArguments   The type arguments.
094     */
095    @SuppressWarnings( "UseOfConcreteClass" )
096    public ParameterizedTypeNameImpl( final ParameterizedTypeNameImpl enclosingType, final ClassNameImpl rawType, final List<? extends TypeNameImpl> typeArguments )
097    {
098        this( enclosingType, rawType, typeArguments, new ArrayList<>() );
099    }   //  ParameterizedTypeNameImpl()
100
101    /**
102     *  Creates a new {@code ParameterizedTypeNameImpl} instance.
103     *
104     *  @param  enclosingType   The optional enclosing type for this instance.
105     *  @param  rawType The class name for this instance.
106     *  @param  typeArguments   The type arguments.
107     *  @param  ignored The annotations.
108     */
109    @SuppressWarnings( "UseOfConcreteClass" )
110    private ParameterizedTypeNameImpl( final ParameterizedTypeNameImpl enclosingType, final ClassNameImpl rawType, final List<? extends TypeNameImpl> typeArguments, final List<AnnotationSpecImpl> ignored )
111    {
112        this( Optional.ofNullable( enclosingType ), rawType, typeArguments, new ArrayList<>() );
113    }   //  ParameterizedTypeNameImpl()
114
115    /**
116     *  Creates a new {@code ParameterizedTypeNameImpl} instance.
117     *
118     *  @param  enclosingType   The optional enclosing type for this instance.
119     *  @param  rawType The class name for this instance.
120     *  @param  typeArguments   The type arguments.
121     *  @param  annotations The annotations.
122     */
123    @SuppressWarnings( {"OptionalUsedAsFieldOrParameterType", "UseOfConcreteClass"} )
124    private ParameterizedTypeNameImpl( final Optional<ParameterizedTypeNameImpl> enclosingType, final ClassNameImpl rawType, final List<? extends TypeNameImpl> typeArguments, final List<AnnotationSpecImpl> annotations )
125    {
126        super( annotations );
127        m_RawType = requireNonNullArgument( rawType, "rawType" ).annotated( annotations.stream().map( a -> (AnnotationSpec) a ).collect( toList() ) );
128        m_EnclosingType = enclosingType;
129        m_TypeArguments = List.copyOf( requireNonNullArgument( typeArguments, "typeArguments" ) );
130
131        checkState( !m_TypeArguments.isEmpty() || enclosingType.isPresent(), () -> new ValidationException( format( "no type arguments: %s", rawType ) ) );
132        for( final var typeArgument : m_TypeArguments )
133        {
134            checkState( !typeArgument.isPrimitive() && (typeArgument != VOID_PRIMITIVE), () -> new ValidationException( format( "invalid type parameter: %s", typeArgument ) ) );
135        }
136    }   //  ParameterizedTypeNameImpl()
137
138        /*---------*\
139    ====** Methods **==========================================================
140        \*---------*/
141    /**
142     *  {@inheritDoc}
143     */
144    @Override
145    @SuppressWarnings( "UseOfConcreteClass" )
146    public final ParameterizedTypeNameImpl annotated( final List<AnnotationSpec> annotations )
147    {
148        final var retValue = new ParameterizedTypeNameImpl( m_EnclosingType, m_RawType, m_TypeArguments, concatAnnotations( annotations ) );
149
150        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
151        return retValue;
152    }   //  annotated()
153
154    /**
155     *  {@inheritDoc}
156     */
157    @SuppressWarnings( {"PublicMethodNotExposedInInterface", "UseOfConcreteClass"} )
158    @Override
159    public final CodeWriter emit( final CodeWriter out ) throws UncheckedIOException
160    {
161        final var retValue = requireNonNullArgument( out, "out" );
162        if( m_EnclosingType.isPresent() )
163        {
164            m_EnclosingType.get().emit( retValue );
165            retValue.emit( "." );
166            if( isAnnotated() )
167            {
168                retValue.emit( " " );
169                emitAnnotations( retValue );
170            }
171            retValue.emit( m_RawType.simpleName() );
172        }
173        else
174        {
175            m_RawType.emit( retValue );
176        }
177
178        if( !m_TypeArguments.isEmpty() )
179        {
180            retValue.emitAndIndent( "<" );
181            var firstParameter = true;
182            for( final var parameter : m_TypeArguments )
183            {
184                if( !firstParameter ) retValue.emitAndIndent( ", " );
185                parameter.emit( retValue );
186                firstParameter = false;
187            }
188            retValue.emitAndIndent( ">" );
189        }
190
191        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
192        return retValue;
193    }   //  emit()
194
195    /**
196     *  Returns a parameterised type, applying the given type arguments to the
197     *  given raw type.
198     *
199     *  @param  rawType The class name for the new type.
200     *  @param  typeArguments   The type arguments.
201     *  @return The new instance of {@code ParameterizedTypeName}.
202     */
203    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.2.0" )
204    @SuppressWarnings( "UseOfConcreteClass" )
205    public static final ParameterizedTypeNameImpl from( final Class<?> rawType, final Type... typeArguments )
206    {
207        @SuppressWarnings( "CastToConcreteClass" )
208        final var retValue = new ParameterizedTypeNameImpl( null, (ClassNameImpl) ClassName.from( rawType ), list( typeArguments ) );
209
210        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
211        return retValue;
212    }   //  from()
213
214    /**
215     *  Returns a parameterised type, applying the given type arguments to the
216     *  given raw type.
217     *
218     *  @param  rawType The class name for the new type.
219     *  @param  typeArguments   The type arguments.
220     *  @return The new instance of {@code ParameterizedTypeName}.
221     */
222    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.2.0" )
223    @SuppressWarnings( "UseOfConcreteClass" )
224    public static final ParameterizedTypeNameImpl from( final ClassName rawType, final TypeName... typeArguments )
225    {
226        @SuppressWarnings( "CastToConcreteClass" )
227        final var retValue = new ParameterizedTypeNameImpl( null, (ClassNameImpl) rawType, stream( requireNonNullArgument( typeArguments, "typeArguments" ) ).map( t -> (TypeNameImpl) t ).collect( toList() ) );
228
229        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
230        return retValue;
231    }   //  from()
232
233    /**
234     *  Returns a parameterised type equivalent to the given type, with the
235     *  given type arguments added.
236     *
237     *  @param  type    The other type.
238     *  @param  typeArguments   The type arguments.
239     *  @return The new instance of {@code ParameterizedTypeName}.
240     */
241    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.2.0" )
242    @SuppressWarnings( "UseOfConcreteClass" )
243    public static final ParameterizedTypeNameImpl from( final ParameterizedType type, final Map<Type,TypeVariableName> typeArguments )
244    {
245        @SuppressWarnings( "CastToConcreteClass" )
246        final var rawType = (ClassNameImpl) ClassName.from( (Class<?>) type.getRawType() );
247        final var ownerType = (type.getOwnerType() instanceof ParameterizedType) && !Modifier.isStatic( ((Class<?>) type.getRawType()).getModifiers() ) ? (ParameterizedType) type.getOwnerType() : null;
248        final var typeArgumentList = TypeNameImpl.list( type.getActualTypeArguments(), typeArguments );
249        final var retValue = nonNull( ownerType )
250            ? from( ownerType, typeArguments ).nestedClass( rawType.simpleName(), typeArgumentList.stream().map( t -> (TypeName) t ).collect( toList() ) )
251            : new ParameterizedTypeNameImpl( null, rawType, typeArgumentList );
252
253        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
254        return retValue;
255    }   //  from()
256
257    /**
258     *  Returns a parameterised type, applying the given type arguments to the
259     *  given raw type.
260     *
261     *  @param  rawType The class name for the new type.
262     *  @param  typeArguments   The type arguments.
263     *  @return The new instance of {@code ParameterizedTypeName}.
264     *
265     *  @deprecated Use
266     *      {@link #from(Class, Type...)}
267     *      instead.
268     */
269    @Deprecated( since = "0.2.0", forRemoval = true )
270    @API( status = DEPRECATED, since = "0.0.5" )
271    @SuppressWarnings( "UseOfConcreteClass" )
272    public static final ParameterizedTypeNameImpl get( final Class<?> rawType, final Type... typeArguments )
273    {
274        @SuppressWarnings( "CastToConcreteClass" )
275        final var retValue = from( rawType, typeArguments );
276
277        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
278        return retValue;
279    }   //  get()
280
281    /**
282     *  Returns a parameterised type, applying the given type arguments to the
283     *  given raw type.
284     *
285     *  @param  rawType The class name for the new type.
286     *  @param  typeArguments   The type arguments.
287     *  @return The new instance of {@code ParameterizedTypeName}.
288     *
289     *  @deprecated Use
290     *      {@link #from(ClassName, TypeName...)}
291     *      instead.
292     */
293    @Deprecated( since = "0.2.0", forRemoval = true )
294    @API( status = DEPRECATED, since = "0.0.5" )
295    @SuppressWarnings( "UseOfConcreteClass" )
296    public static final ParameterizedTypeNameImpl get( final ClassName rawType, final TypeName... typeArguments )
297    {
298        final var retValue = from( rawType, typeArguments );
299
300        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
301        return retValue;
302    }   //  get()
303
304    /**
305     *  Returns a parameterised type equivalent to the given type.
306     *
307     *  @param  type    The other type.
308     *  @param  typeArguments   The type arguments.
309     *  @return The new instance of {@code ParameterizedTypeName}.
310     *
311     *  @deprecated Use
312     *      {@link #from(ParameterizedType)}
313     *      instead.
314     */
315    @Deprecated( since = "0.2.0", forRemoval = true )
316    @API( status = DEPRECATED, since = "0.0.5" )
317    @SuppressWarnings( "UseOfConcreteClass" )
318    public static ParameterizedTypeName get( final ParameterizedType type, final Map<Type,TypeVariableName> typeArguments  )
319    {
320        final var retValue = from( type, typeArguments );
321
322        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
323        return retValue;
324    }   //  from()
325
326    /**
327     *  {@inheritDoc}
328     */
329    @Override
330    @SuppressWarnings( "UseOfConcreteClass" )
331    public final ParameterizedTypeNameImpl nestedClass( final CharSequence name )
332    {
333        final var retValue = new ParameterizedTypeNameImpl( this, m_RawType.nestedClass( requireNonNullArgument( name, "name" ) ), new ArrayList<>(), new ArrayList<>() );
334
335        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
336        return retValue;
337    }   //  nestedClass()
338
339    /**
340     *  {@inheritDoc}
341     */
342    @Override
343    @SuppressWarnings( "UseOfConcreteClass" )
344    public final ParameterizedTypeNameImpl nestedClass( final CharSequence name, final List<TypeName> typeArguments )
345    {
346        @SuppressWarnings( "CastToConcreteClass" )
347        final var retValue = new ParameterizedTypeNameImpl( this, m_RawType.nestedClass( requireNonNullArgument( name, "name" ) ), typeArguments.stream().map( t -> (TypeNameImpl) t ).collect( toList() ), new ArrayList<>() );
348
349        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
350        return retValue;
351    }   //  nestedClass()
352
353    /**
354     *  {@inheritDoc}
355     */
356    @Override
357    @SuppressWarnings( "UseOfConcreteClass" )
358    public final ClassNameImpl rawType() { return m_RawType; }
359
360    /**
361     *  {@inheritDoc}
362     */
363    @Override
364    public final List<TypeNameImpl> typeArguments() { return m_TypeArguments; }
365
366    /**
367     *  {@inheritDoc}
368     */
369    @Override
370    @SuppressWarnings( "UseOfConcreteClass" )
371    public final ParameterizedTypeNameImpl withoutAnnotations()
372    {
373        final var retValue = new ParameterizedTypeNameImpl( m_EnclosingType, m_RawType.withoutAnnotations(), m_TypeArguments, new ArrayList<>() );
374
375        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
376        return retValue;
377    }   //  withoutAnnotations()
378}
379//  class ParameterizedTypeNameImpl
380
